name: The Black Ring 2
description: In 9 days, the universe as you know it will be destroyed and darkness will spread across the world and the universe. As three friends tried looking for sonic after his disappearence they've met their terrible fate and faced "The Prophecy Of Doom". As the evil god entity known as "Osston" will be warping to other universes to universes, will destroy every universe until everything will be nothing but darkness and void. Will there be hope and that sonic would come back and stop this monstrosity? Or there would be no hope and the world would be lost forever?
